adviseScripts.text: No. 7, which flavor do you prefer: strawberry or orange?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Strawberry.
Orange.
Hm, is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Strawberry it is, then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I hope you don't live to regret it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Orange?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Turns out No. 7 really is a lucky guy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: One orange flavor, coming right up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Much better than strawberry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Ether about medicines and their tastes.
I figured I'd better ask you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you like me calling you No. 7?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I like it.
I don't like it. Make up something else.
Good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Not that it matters, though. I wouldn't change your nickname just because you didn't like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I asked if you liked it. I didn't say anything about changing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You're No. 7 to me, and that's that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure you'll warm up to your number in time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Ether about her fondness for numbers.
"Science is for the betterment of humankind."
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you know that phrase?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I do.
Never heard it before.
I'm glad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: As long as each experiment that I conduct
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: is for the sake of humankind,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: you'll be willing to look the other way, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That's fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Don't worry about it. Forget I brought it up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You're kinda cute sometimes, you know that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Ether about science.
Hey, No.7.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: How would you feel if I used you as a test subject for some dangerous experiments?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Just give me a heads-up beforehand.
I don't believe you'd do something like that.
You actually think I'd do that to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That makes me a little sad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I always think I take pretty good care of you, in my own special way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Precisely! How could I ever subject my precious No. 7 to experiments like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you have so much faith in me. Don't let that change.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No matter what I tell you to do, you have to do it, because you trust me. Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I tell Ether not to carry out any more dangerous experiments.
Have you ever heard the scary story about the library?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Every night, way back at the faaar end of the bookshelves,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: you can hear someone wailing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Does that kind of story... interest you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Oh? Then allow me to remind you:
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Curiosity killed the cat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: So let's make sure kitty no. 7 doesn't get too curious, OK?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No? Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No. 7 is a brave guy, isn't he?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Or maybe he's just more cautious than most people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Whatever it is, I'm sure you'll be able to avoid all kinds of untimely deaths.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk about creepy ghost stories with Ether.
How does Syuen always stay so alert?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: It's fascinating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to give Syuen her own subject number,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: but I figured you wouldn't want me to. Unless...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Not happening.
I think it's a great idea.
Meh. What a bummer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm positive Syuen would produce a plethora of intriguing results.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Oh well. C'est la vie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You agree with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: How come? Are you excited to be around another fellow test subject?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: This is all so exciting!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I promise I'll try my very best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I talk about Syuen.
Most people freak out when they see an operating room or a lab table.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you think there's any way to make them less intimidating?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Play some exciting music.
Tranquilize people before bringing them in.
No.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I don't like that. Bad idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Tranquilize them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Nice. I'll keep that in mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Ether talking about the operating room.
No. 7, you know that I think about you a lot, don't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: It's only natural to look after your test subjects and make sure they're healthy.
No, I didn't know that.
Yes, but that's not the only reason.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I have a real affection for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm not as scary as the others make me out to be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You don't? But I've done so much for you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Well, it can't be helped. I'll just have to provide you with a bit more care.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk more with Ether about how she shows affection.
I've heard that one of your Nikkes
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: may have had their DNA mixed with that of a dog?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Is that true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No. She's just as adorable as a puppy dog, that's all.
Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That's a shame.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: She could have made for a very intriguing test subject.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Why are you being so quiet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Oh, so that kind of Nikke really does exist?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Don't worry. I won't ask you her name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I can find that out myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I try very hard to pull Ether's attention away from Poli.
No.7, have you ever been to the Outer Rim?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
How was it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: It's incredible, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: So many new subjects for my experiments...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: The next time you go, can you bring me with you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: No?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You really should check it out sometime.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You can find all sorts of useful things over there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Ether about the Outer Rim.
*Yawn* I'm pooped.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I've been pulling some all-nighters for the past few days,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: and now I don't feel like doing much of anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Then don't do anything.
Develop a medication that will give you some energy.
But there's still so much left to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I need to buy new stockings, and
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I have to send the research data to Mana...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ugh... I'm just not feeling it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That's...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: not a bad idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I can formulate something exclusively for Nikkes to use.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I can have it send a signal to the...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'll think about this more after I have a nice lie down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I take care of the tasks Ether doesn't have the energy to finish.
You know how people say the more bitter medicine tastes, the better it is for you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you think there's any truth to that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I think so.
That's just an old wives' tale.
You really think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Seriously?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'll make this medicine as bitter as possible for you then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... If you thought there was an element of truth to it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I was going to put it to the test and have you take some of this bitter medicine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You talked your way out of this one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I talk about medication and whether its taste has any effect on the body.
What's a food you're craving?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'll make it for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If you want to give me some medicine, just say so.
I'm willing to eat anything.
Perceptive, as always!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I've just got some supplements I wanted you to try out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you're willing to try them,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: because I didn't feel like cooking anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Really? Whatever I make?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: All right, I don't want to hear any bellyaching when I feed you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You got that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I debate over whether the flavor of food is important.
This is so frustrating!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Why isn't my research proceeding smoothly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Have I been overthinking it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Go and get some sleep.
Just keep at it, you're bound to come up with a solution sooner or later.
I can't do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Our research deadline is just around the corner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I can't waste any time catching 40 winks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I need to rack my brain to come up with a solution, even if it drives me up a wall.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I see you're not one the most sympathetic person around...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: But... you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If my research has hit a snag, I need to rack my brain until I come up with a solution.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You really know your stuff, No. 7!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I listened a little longer to Ether as she vented.
I've been pondering if there is any way of overcoming one's deficiencies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: What are your thoughts on this issue, No. 7?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If you put your mind to it, you can overcome any deficiency you have.
Science can help you overcome any deficiency.
Effort?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You mean like willpower? I'm surprised to hear you believe in such an unscientific concept.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I don't believe in anything unscientific so I can't stand hearing people go on about willpower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You're right about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Science can overcome anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: It's all thanks to science that we were able to take normal girls
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: with no previous combat experience and turn them into killing machines.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I debate more on science versus willpower.
Sigh... Look how nice it is outside...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Days like this make me want to turn in my two weeks notice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If you quit, what will you do about money?
If you quit, think about all the research that will go unfunded.
Right, I won't be getting a paycheck anymore...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Fine, you have a point. Money is important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That's not why I'm deciding to stay though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: What is going on here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: How do you know so much about me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: That's exactly why I could never leave this job.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether once again gave up her thoughts of turning in her resignation letter.
Hmmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Hmmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you have something to say to me?
I don't want to get on the lab table just yet.
What? It's nothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I've grown fonder of you, so I was just staring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Nothing to be nervous about.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You catch on fast!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You could be right. Perhaps putting you on the lab table right now
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: would be a little premature.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I tried to dissuade Ether from conducting experiments on me.
Rip... rip!
Aw man! My stockings ripped again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Sigh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Let me guess... You don't feel like buying new ones.
You must be really irritated.
Bingo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Soooo... could you go buy me some new stockings?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I really don't want to go...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Not necessarily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I just don't feel like going out to buy new ones.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Since you didn't get it right,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: can you go buy me some new stockings?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I went to buy some stockings for Ether since she didn't feel like doing it herself.
NO.7, have you been taking good care of yourself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Let me know if you're not feeling well. I'll prescribe you some medicine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: ... That won't be necessary.
Um... sure. Got it. Don't worry about me.
Why do you look so weirded out?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'm going out of my way to be nice to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If that's how you show gratitude, maybe I'll send you the wrong medicine to teach you a lesson.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: What is it? Why are you so nervous?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: At least you didn't turn me down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: If you had, I might have ended up using it against you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: You're as sharp as a tack!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I talk about how we look after our health.
They have no basis in science, but do you believe in ghosts?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I believe ghosts exist.
Of course there's no such thing as ghosts.
Really? Hmmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to think there are ghosts out there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: After all, if that was the case,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I'd be surrounded by ghosts all the time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Then I could catch them and conduct all sorts of experiments on them!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Do you know how much fun that would be? Sigh...too bad they're not real.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Obviously. It's ridiculous to think something like ghosts could actually exist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: I just thought it was an interesting question to ask.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Don't read too much into it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ether

adviseScripts.text: Ether and I end up swapping ghost stories.
